casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Eric Wilson TAYLOR 3P19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 9, 2019 Sarah Holladay, Attorney at Law, for Taylor, Eric Wilson. Kathryne E. Hathcock, Assistant Attorney General, Locke Bell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 4th of January 2019 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of January 2019."
